The views, opinions and/or findings contained in this report are those of the author(s) and should not be construed as an official Department of the Army or Navy position, policy or decision unless so designated by other documentation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6d258","text":"OBJECTIVE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eor1q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72f4l","text":"To outline steps for properly storing swab samples and nucleic acid samples purified from these samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5v73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbq72","text":"SUMMARY/SCOPE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dguj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ad1v","text":"The overarching aim of the REDI-NET is to develop a collaborative laboratory network between domestic and international partnering institutions to address disease surveillance needs in order to effectively detect, predict and contain potentially emergent zoonosis. This SOP provides guidance on storage of swab samples and their purified nucleic acid to preserve their integrity for downstream nucleic acid extraction and/or sequencing library preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg7oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"414c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7528t","text":"MAINTENANCE OF EQUIPMENT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q1u4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81k6n","text":"Decontaminate a PCR workstation by keeping the UV light on for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2moos","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoqte","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"A24C9C601FDC11EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
keywords: STORAGE PROCEDURE FOR UNTREATED SAMPLE,STORAGE PROCEDURE FOR TOTAL NUCLEIC ACID

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1s61r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfhkt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8uik","text":"Precool 96-well microfuge tube racks  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cvln0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2mk8","text":"NOTES: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":130}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8c1ut","text":"Swab samples need to be kept on cold chain all the time to prevent RNA degradation. The following procedure will apply only where   storage is feasible.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":3},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":70},{"key":3,"length":1,"offset":305}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7nos3","text":"If   storage is not possible, temporarily store the tick samples in a   freezer and follow swab sample processing SOP (REDI-NET SOP SW-2 Swab Processing) as soon as possible for total nucleic acid extraction. Subsequently, use a portion of the total nucleic acid and reverse- transcribe RNA into cDNA for   storage. To do this, follow the initial steps of the tick sample testing SOP (REDI-NET SOP SW-4 Swab Testing) cDNA Synthesis, until finishing step 40.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"1":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D5235401FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"2":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1162B4701FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"3":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"142B98701FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77mu8","text":"Using preprinted adhesive labels or permanent markers, label 1.5 ml microfuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25hn0","text":"Once the rack is full or all swab samples have been completed, label the rack with a unique rack ID.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esii","text":"Close the rack lid tightly, secure with clear Saran wrap and immediately transfer to   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"227150001FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e52cr","text":"Update the freezer inventory so samples can be tracked properly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aodvu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rnnc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8leoj","text":"In the clean PCR workstation, carefully transfer the eluted total nucleic acid to a 96-well PCR microplate, make sure to keep samples in the exact same locations corresponding to the rack where the original blood were stored.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5me63","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdkds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"43c32","text":"NOTES: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"961j4","text":"The following procedure is to properly store total nucleic acid extracted from swab samples (including negative controls) using the KingFisher nucleic acid purification system. The eluted total nucleic acid will be in either 96-well microplate (Flex model) or elution strip (Duo Prime model).","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":43}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5s9km","text":"Total nucleic acid samples need to be kept   all the time to minimize RNA degradation.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"420A74501FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f3ckc","text":"IMPORTANT: Mark the “A1” position of the 96-well microplate to prevent any mistakes on plate orientation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eo31","text":"Cover the 96-well PCR microplate with adhesive film to prevent spill over or contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ab7h0","text":"Label the film with a unique plate ID.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b45v0","text":"Update the freezer inventory so samples can be tracked properly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bp9tp","text":"Transfer swab sample into the corresponding pre-labeled 1.5 mL microfuge tubes, cut and discard the swab shaft and keep the tip portion only, close the cap and put it onto the microfuge tube rack   sequentially.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":196,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"20l95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

title: SW-3 SWAB STORAGE
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ht02","text":"RISKS AND PERSONAL PROTECTION:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s5cs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfo6m","text":"Gloves should be worn all the time when handling samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
